description:
Multi-chain support for BTC/ETH/BNB/NEAR/Polygon/Solana/Avalanche/Fantom and others


✨ New Features
- Added support for Dynex / OctaSpace networks.
- Support for fungible assets on the Nervos network.
- Support for OneKey Pro Bootloader upgrades.
- 1inch router for swaps now supports zkSync and Base networks.
- Added Space ID to the toolbar.
🐞 Bug Fixes
- Fixed an issue where coin names appeared as UNKNOWN in some app notifications.
- Fixed limited transaction fee options (standard and custom) for some dApps.
- Fixed an error when transferring the maximum amount of ETH on the Base network.
- Fixed abnormal quote data in the Socket router.
- Fixed the inability to transfer due to excessive inputs on the Nexa network.
- Fixed transaction order issues in the transaction acceleration feature.
- Fixed the ability to paste negative numbers during transfers.
- Fixed display of non-own address data in the transaction history on the Kaspa network.
- Fixed errors when transferring UTXOs below the network's required value on the Kaspa network.
- Fixed an issue with additional remark data in hardware signature information during swap transactions on the Algorand network.
- Fixed display overlap when favoriting NFTs on Pro devices.
- Fixed maximum character limit issues when editing hardware device names in the app.
- Fixed incorrect guidance when entering the wrong PIN on a Lite card.
- Fixed duplicated display of Kele data on the ETH token details page.
💎 Improvements
- Updated block explorers for the Solana and SUI networks.
- Changed the BTC network's fee estimation source to Mempool.
- Discontinued support for Heco, OKT, and Boba networks under the OpenOcean router in swaps.

✨ 新功能
- 新增支持 Dynex / OctaSpace 网络。
- 支持 Nervos 网络下的 Fungible 资产。
- 支持 OneKey Pro 升级 Bootloader。
- Swap 的 1inch 渠道支持 zkSync 和 Base 网络。
- 工具栏中新增 Space ID。
🐞 问题修正
- 修复在 App 的部分推送中，币种名称显示 UNKNOWN 的问题。
- 修复部分 dApp 交易费用只有普通跟自定义两档选择的问题。
- 修复 Base 网络下，使用最大值转账 ETH 时报错的问题。
- 修复 Socket 渠道报价数据异常的问题。
- 修复 Nexa 网络下，由于 Inputs 过多，导致无法转出的问题。
- 修复交易加速功能中的交易次序问题。
- 修复在转账过程中，可粘贴负数的问题。
- 修复 Kaspa 网络的交易历史中，显示非自己地址的数据问题。
- 修复 Kaspa 网络下，转 UTXOs 小于网络规定值报错的问题。
- 修复 Algorand 网络下，Swap 交易时硬件签名信息多了备注数据的问题。
- 修复在 Pro 设备上，收藏 NFT 导致显示重叠的问题。
- 修复 App 编辑硬件设备名称时的最大字符限制问题。
- 修复 Lite 卡输入错误 PIN 码，提示引导错误的问题。
- 修复 ETH 代币详情页中 Kele 数据重复展示的问题。
💎 改进
- Solana、SUI 网络的区块浏览器更新。
- 更换 BTC 网络的手续费估算数据源为 Mempool。
- Swap 的 OpenOcean 渠道下线 Heco / OKT / Boba 网络的支持。

Full Changelog: https://github.com/OneKeyHQ/app-monorepo/compare/v4.23.0...v4.24.0
